name: Tiny Islands (thomasmichaelwallace)
description:
Sea levels are rising, and they're taking the world with it.

A lonely boat travels from drowning islands to submerging towers, picking up everyone they can.

How many people can you save before the time runs out?

~ Controls ~

  • Forward/Backwards - Speed up / Slow down (this boat can reverse)
  • Left/Right - Turn left / right
  • Get close enough to people and they'll jump for safety
  • Space - Restart after game over

~ Attributions ~

This game wouldn't be anywhere near as good without these great people sharing their work:

  • "Speedboat Loop.wav" by morganpurkis is in the Public Domain, CC0
